title: Unity
subtitle: Map
description: Users can manipulate images directly within the browser, allowing for real-time editing and collaboration. The platform offers a range of tools for image manipulation, such as cropping, resizing, adding filters, and more.

title: Stayo
subtitle: App
description: This platform facilitates vacation rentals, connecting property owners with travelers seeking accommodations worldwide. It offers features such as secure bookings, rent, and reviews to enhance the rental experience.

title: Netflix
subtitle: Clone
description: Users can explore a wide variety of movies and TV shows, watch trailers, and sign up to create an account.

title: Spotify
subtitle: Clone
description: With a user-friendly interface and dynamic features, this Spotify-Clone brings the world of music to your fingertips.

title: Jammy
subtitle: App
description: An app that allows you to create lyrics, chords, tabs, and the main melody of a song. You can also save your songs.

title: Link
subtitle: Sharing
description: A personalized link sharing platform designed to streamline and simplify how you connect with others online.

title: Stellar
subtitle: Sales
description: Explore a diverse range of categories, enjoy personalized recommendations, and effortlessly navigate through a sleek and modern design.
